# Matematika

Ushbu kurs davomida biz LLM matematik qobiliyatini oshirish uchun qo'llanilishi mumkin bo'lgan turli xil prompting usullarini ko'rdik. Yaqinda paydo bo'lgan yondashuvlardan biri, MathPrompter (@imani2023mathprompter), ushbu usullarning ayrimlarini (COT, PAL va boshqalar) yagona texnikaga birlashtiradi. Asosiy g'oya - matematik savolni algebraik atamalarga ajratib, so'ng uni turli usullarda yechish uchun Python kodidan foydalanishdir.



MathPrompterda **to'rt** bosqich mavjud. Biz ularni quyidagi misol muammosi yordamida tushuntirib beramiz. Misol to'g'ridan-to'g'ri maqoladan olingan.

<AIInput>
S: Restoranda har bir kattalar uchun ovqat 5 dollar turadi va bolalar bepul ovqatlanadi. Agar 15 kishilik guruh
odamlar keldi va 8 tasi bolalar edi, guruh uchun ovqatlanish qancha turadi?
</AIInput>

## 1-qadam: Algebraik shablonni yarating

Birinchi qadam â€“ savoldagi har bir son uchun o'zgaruvchi belgilashdir. Bu yordam beradi, chunki savolni mavhum matematik savolga va dasturlash kodiga osonroq tarjima qilish imkonini beradi.

Bu bir nechta misollar yordamida prompting orqali amalga oshirilishi mumkin:

## 2-qadam: Matematika so'rovlari

Ushbu bosqichning maqsadi muammoni ham algebraik ifoda, ham Python kodi sifatida shakllantirishdir. Ushbu bosqichda ikki xil prompt bir vaqtda qo'llaniladi, bu esa muammoning turli xil ifodalarini taqdim etishga yordam beradi.

### 2a: Algebraik Bayonot

Biz LLM ni few-shot prompt qilish orqali matematik muammoni algebraik ifoda sifatida tasvirlashga undashimiz mumkin. Bu, LLM dan javob formatini "Answer =" bilan boshlanadigan tarzda yaratishni so'rash orqali amalga oshiriladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%%%2BKAmGxhZGk%2FXG5Nb3NsYXNodGlyaXNoOiB7QTogNSwgQjogMTUsIEM6IDh9XG5cbk1hdGVtYXRpayB0ZW5nbGFtYSB5b3ppbmcgdmEgamF2b2IgZm9ybWF0aW5pIGhvc2lsIHFpbGluZyxcbidBbnN3ZXIgPScgYmlsYW4gYm9zaGxhbnNpbi5cblxuSmF2b2I6XG5BbnN3ZXIgPSBBICogKEIg4oiSIEMpIiwibW9kZWwiOiJ0ZXh0LWRhdmluY2ktMDAzIn0%3D"

    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### 2b: Python kodi

Biz, shuningdek, LLM dan muammoni hal qiladigan Python kodi yaratishni so'rashimiz mumkin. Bu, LLM dan Python funksiyasini yaratishni so'rash orqali amalga oshiriladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%2FigJhsYWRpP1xuTW9zbGFzaHRpcmlzaDoge0E6IDEyLCBCOiA0LCBDOiAyfVxuXG5KYXZvYm5pIHFheXRhcmFkaWdhbiBQeXRob24gZnVua3NpeWFzaW5pIHlvemluZy5cblxuZGVmIHpvb19jb3N0KEEsIEIsIEMpOlxuICByZXR1cm4gQSAqIEJcblxuXG5Tc2ggKFF0KTogRG%2FigJhrb25kYSBwb3lhYnphbG5pbmcgYmlyIGp1ZnRpIEEgZG9sbGFyLCBwYXlwb3FuaW5nIGJpciBqdWZ0aSBCIGRvbGxhciB0dXJhZGkuIEFnYXIgbWlqb3ogQyBqdWZ0IHBveWFiemFsIHZhIEQganVmdCBwYXlwb3Egc290aWIgb2xzYSwgeGFyaWRuaW5nIHVtdW1peSBxaXltYXRpIHFhbmNoYSBib%2BKAmGxhZGk%%2BKAmGxzYSwgZ3VydWggdWNodW4gb3ZxYXRsYW5pc2ggamFtaSBxYW5jaGEgYm%2FigJhsYWRpP1xuXG5KYXZvYm5pIHFheXRhcmFkaWdhbiBQeXRob24gZnVua3NpeWFzaW5pIHlvemluZy4iLCJtb2RlbCI6InRleHQtZGF2aW5jaS0wMDMifQ%3D%3D"

></iframe>

### Javob Yaratish

Endi, biz ilgari yaratgan Mapping yordamida o'zgaruvchilarni avtomatik tarzda to'ldirishimiz mumkin.

```text
Moslashtirish: {A: 5, B: 15, C: 8}
```

Algebraic:

<AIInput>
 Javob = 5 * 15 - 5 * 8
</AIInput>

Python funksiyasi:

<AIInput>
def restaurant_cost(A=5, B=15, C=8):
  return A * (B - C)
</AIInput>

Biz ikkala usulni ham Python yordamida baholashimiz mumkin.

Algebraic:

<AIInput>
>
> eval("5 * 15 - 5 * 8")
35
</AIInput>

Python funksiyasi:

<AIInput>
>
> restaurant_cost()
35
</AIInput>

## 4-qadam: O'z-o'zini izchillik

Oxir-oqibat, biz yuqoridagi jarayonni bir necha marta (~5) qayta bajarish uchun Self-Consistency dan foydalanamiz, so'ngra ko'pchilik javobini tanlaymiz.

## Xulosa

MathPrompter MultiArith (@roy-roth-2015-solving) ma'lumotlar to'plamida 92,5% aniqlikni ko'rsatadi. Ushbu texnikaning muvaffaqiyati bu kurs davomida o'rgangan uslublaringizni birlashtirib, yirik muammolarni hal qilish uchun qo'llashingiz mumkinligining ajoyib namunasi hisoblanadi.
